q: how do men sprinkled water in the order
pred: In the video, a man is seen sprinkling water on a wooden fence while standing on a ladder. He is using a hose to spray the water on the fence. This is a common method of applying wood stain to a wooden fence, as it helps to evenly distribute the stain and create a smooth, uniform finish. The man is likely following the instructions provided by the manufacturer of the wood stain to ensure the best results.
